## IStandardDebugFlags.DEBUG\_DISABLE\_EXPENSIVE\_CHECKS property

Disable debug checks that do not run in constant time.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEBUG_DISABLE_EXPENSIVE_CHECKS: "DEBUG_DISABLE_EXPENSIVE_CHECKS";
```
